1.title: Find Your Representatives
1.subtitle: Here you can find your representatives, how to contact them, bills they’ve introduced, committees they serve on, and political contributions they’ve received.

1.title: Esusu
1.subtitle: Forbes Under 30 social entrepreneurs, Nigerian-born entrepreneur Wemimo and his business partner Goel co-founded Esusu in 2019. The mobile platform helps individuals mostly from marginalized communities save money, access capital and build credit.

2.title: Jarvis Boards
2.subtitle: Jarvis Boards' mission has always been to craft paddle boards in Austin, Texas that are environmentally friendly, look great, and perform well. To accomplish this, we employ a wide range of techniques to craft our small-batch production wooden SUPs in our Austin studio.

products.name: Hollow Core Paddle Board Frame Kits
products.description: There is something magical about creating something with your own two hands. Building your own hollow core paddle board will be one of the most rewarding projects that you'll tackle.

products.name: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hat
products.description: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hats aren't just for dads. This one's got a low profile with an adjustable strap and curved visor. Available in khaki and light blue.

products.name: Surf Wax Candle
products.description: We teamed up with our friends at Jimbo's Surf Wax to create a unique line of surf wax candles. Each candle is slow cooked over a wood stove in Maine using surf wax and a hint of coconut.

2.title: Gentleman AF
2.subtitle: Gentleman AF is a beard care line featuring a beard wash, beard oils, and beard balms for classy men with a dash of savagery.

products.name: Beard Balms
products.description: Scoop a dime sized amount of beard balm with your finger and place it in the palm of your hands. Rub it between both palms until it melts. Apply it to your beard, comb it down and style as desired.

products.name: Beard Wash
products.description: Wet your face and neck, place a small amount of beard wash in the palm of your hands and massage it into your beard and face, including your neck. Rinse your beard thoroughly.

products.name: Beard Oils
products.description: Shake well before use. Drop a dime sized amount of beard oil in the palm of your hands. Rub your hands and apply the oil from your skin to the tip of your beard.

3.title: Shop Thoughtful
3.subtitle: thoughtful is a nonprofit that seeks to promote black businesses and create a one-stop-shop for consumers who want to vote with their wallets. thoughtful does not take any commissions off of the businesses it promotes, it is purely a hub designed to uplift and support established Black-owned businesses online.

products.name: Olivia Twist Headband
products.description: This is timeless versatility. Two loops of our cotton fabric linked at center. An alluring piece for easy, low maintenance styles.

products.name: Black Trans Lives
products.description: #BlackTransLivesMatter

products.name: Nano-Ionic Facial Steamer
products.description: Facial steam combined with ionic water particles is up to 10x more effective than other facial steamers in penetrating the skin.

3.title: Sweet Pea Books Inc
3.subtitle: Sweet Pea Books is dedicated to producing multicultural books that expose, inspire, amuse, and foster a love of reading in all children. Sweet Pea Books aims to promote the development of good character by teaching values through literature as well as expose young readers to different cultures.

products.name: D Is For Dragon Fruit (Hardcover)
products.description: D is for Dragon Fruit is a vibrantly illustrated, exotic fruit alphabet book that exposes children to a variety of nutritious fruits, reinforces the alphabet and expands a child’s knowledge of the world.

products.name: When Mama Braids My Hair (Hardcover)
products.description: When Mama Braids My Hair captures a young girl’s experience of having her hair braided and the bond it creates with her mother. The tradition of African hair braiding is more than just a Sunday routine. Come join Nikki on an adventure as she is transformed into an Egyptian queen, a Nigerian goddess, a Zulu warrior, and a Maasai girl.

products.name: Elephants Don't Have Stripes! (COMING SOON!)
products.description: Elephants Don’t Have Stripes! Deep in the valley, in the dry grasslands of the African savanna, a young elephant admires other animals for their beauty. He yearns to look and act more like them. One by one, each wish comes true and the young elephant couldn’t be happier.

4.title: Raycon
4.subtitle: Raycon is built around the mission that everyone deserves to enjoy great audio. We believe amazing audio experiences inspire go-getters around the world and power their everyday lives.

products.name: The Everyday Earbuds
products.description: Our most compact wireless earbuds for your everyday grind. Designed to deliver more powerful sound than any earbuds of its size.

products.name: The Trendsetter H20 Headphones
products.description: Choose what you hear with superior noise cancellation that enhances sound quality while blocking outside distractions. Push the boundaries and find your flow with fully immersive surround sound.

products.name: The Runner's Belt
products.description: A nifty and lightweight belt to fuel your workouts. Hold your smartphone, Raycon earbuds, and other daily essentials for your run or gym sessions.

4.title: Accountability in a Time of Justice
4.subtitle: Accountability is a well-worn word in social justice circles. We have worked hard to figure out what accountability means to us as we attempt to walk our social justice talk.

5.title: Savor Seasoning Blends
5.subtitle: Savor Seasonings blends are handcrafted creations by the Spencer family; Dulani, Lisa and Myles.

products.name: Rubbed: Honey, It's BBQ
products.description: A honey based rub for your ribs, ham salmon. The honey base will give your meats a nice crispy, caramel crust.

products.name: Truffle Butter
products.description: Sweet cream butter, blended with Italian black truffles and truffle salt. Your potatoes, beef, pork, veggies, sourdough bread, pasta, seafood, rice and your tummy will thank you!

products.name: Vampire Salt (6oz Grinder)
products.description: A blend of garlic cloves and sea salt. It's just that simple. Try it on everything; soups, sauces, poultry, pork, beef, mashed potatoes, veggies.

5.title: Open Yale Courses: African American History: From Emancipation to the Present
5.subtitle: The purpose of this course is to examine the African American experience in the United States from 1863 to the present. Prominent themes include the end of the Civil War and the beginning of Reconstruction; African Americans’ urbanization experiences; the development of the modern civil rights movement and its aftermath; and the thought and leadership of Booker T. Washington, Ida B. Wells-Barnett, W.E.B. Du Bois, Marcus Garvey, Martin Luther King Jr., and Malcolm X.

5.title: Frederick Douglass
5.subtitle: Frederick Douglass was an escaped slave who became a prominent activist, author and public speaker.

6.title: Omalicha Naturals
6.subtitle: Omalicha translates to beautiful in our native language of Igbo. We handcraft all natural, clean beauty products for the hair and skin designed to bring ones natural beauty to the forefront.

products.name: Honey Pomegranate Facial Scrub
products.description: Our Honey Pomegranate Facial scrub is formulated with natural oils for a gentle exfoliation. Honey is a natural humectant that utilizes its dual properties of draw in moisture and locking it in. After one use, you will notice an immediate difference in your skins texture.

products.name: Lavender Cucumber Bliss facial toner
products.description: Our Lavender Cucumber Bliss facial toner soothes and restores balance to the skin. Its non-alcoholic astringent fights breakouts without drying the skin.

products.name: Avocado Mango Deep Treatment Mask
products.description: Our Avocado Mango Deep Treatment Mask is a thick, creamy deep conditioner fortified with luscious oils, botanical extracts and soft butters. It is used after cleansing the hair to impart moisture and elasticity back into your strands.

6.title: Pod Save the People Podcast
6.subtitle: On Pod Save the People, DeRay Mckesson explores news, culture, social justice, and politics with Sam Sinyangwe, Kaya Henderson and De’Ara Balenger. They offer a unique take on the news, with a special focus on overlooked stories and topics that often impact people of color.

7.title: Jarvis Boards
7.subtitle: Jarvis Boards' mission has always been to craft paddle boards in Austin, Texas that are environmentally friendly, look great, and perform well. To accomplish this, we employ a wide range of techniques to craft our small-batch production wooden SUPs in our Austin studio.

products.name: Hollow Core Paddle Board Frame Kits
products.description: There is something magical about creating something with your own two hands. Building your own hollow core paddle board will be one of the most rewarding projects that you'll tackle.

products.name: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hat
products.description: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hats aren't just for dads. This one's got a low profile with an adjustable strap and curved visor. Available in khaki and light blue.

products.name: Surf Wax Candle
products.description: We teamed up with our friends at Jimbo's Surf Wax to create a unique line of surf wax candles. Each candle is slow cooked over a wood stove in Maine using surf wax and a hint of coconut.

7.title: NAACP Legal Defense and Education Fund
7.subtitle: Through litigation, advocacy, and public education, LDF seeks structural changes to expand democracy, eliminate disparities, and achieve racial justice in a society that fulfills the promise of equality for all Americans. LDF also defends the gains and protections won over the past 75 years of civil rights struggle and works to improve the quality and diversity of judicial and executive appointments.

8.title: Smile Natural Products
8.subtitle: After struggling to find an ethical, big-brand hygiene company, Founder and Chief Executive Officer Brian Mays decided to create one with Smile Natural Products.

products.name: Toothpaste Sampler Pack
products.description: Can't choose? Try all four toothpaste flavors and find your favorite! Mint + Charcoal, Cinnamon + Clove, Vanilla + Lavender, Ginger + Turmeric

products.name: Relax Body Duo
products.description: Cleanse and moisturize with a Large Relax Black Soap Body Wash (16oz) and Large Relax Body Butter (8oz).

products.name: Lavender Essential Oil
products.description: Bulgarian Lavender Essential Oil is a common favorite in aromatherapy use. Lavender is well known for its calming properties, as well as being the most versatile essential oil out there.

8.title: White Privilege: Unpacking the Invisible Knapsack
8.subtitle: As a white person, I realized I had been taught about racism as something that puts others at a disadvantage, but had been taught not to see one of its corollary aspects, white privilege, which puts me at an advantage.

9.title: Be A Good Person
9.subtitle: Instead of supporting the current trends of negativity, our #1 goal is to remind us all to approach our days with an optimistic, positive, and refreshed outlook. We believe that positive change truly starts with within ourselves, one person at a time.

products.name: Black Color Spectrum Shirt
products.description: Fashion fit, soft feel. Water based ink screen print. BAGP hem tag. Straight cut bottom

products.name: Reflective Core Bodysuit
products.description: One Piece bodysuit but versatile enough to be utilized as a swimsuit.

products.name: Cardinal Snapback Hat
products.description: Cardinal Snapback BE A GOOD PERSON Hat

9.title: Dr. Ernest Everett Just
9.subtitle: Dr. Ernest Just was a pioneering African American biologist, academic and science writer. Just's primary legacy is his recognition of the fundamental role of the cell surface in the development of organisms.

10.title: The Honey Pot Company
10.subtitle: Stay clean, fresh, and balanced, even during your period with our natural menstrual products. Banish bacteria and cramps with herbal-infused, chemical-free sanitary pads and tampons that create a "cooling" effect that’s both protective and soothing.

products.name: Menstrual Cup
products.description: If tampons or pads aren't your "cup" of tea, reach for the Honey Pot Co Menstrual Cup: a convenient, sustainable alternative that's good for you and the earth.

products.name: Mommy-to-Be Wash
products.description: Use our feminine hygiene wash during pregnancy to balance your pH, fight odor-causing bacteria, and calm discomfort while gently cleansing your honeypot.

products.name: Soothing Body Balm
products.description: This body salve is infused with natural magnesium for menstrual cramps and 500 mg of broad-spectrum hemp distillate. This hemp and magnesium body balm does not contain THC.

10.title: Support the Milwaukee Freedom Fund
10.subtitle: The Milwaukee Freedom Fund is extending support to protestors in Kenosha, WI. Their mission is to build on ongoing bail abolition efforts, support immigration efforts, work towards Black and Brown Liberation, and support Black and Brown young people as they build a new world.

10.title: Revisionist History: Miss Buchanan’s Period of Adjustment
10.subtitle: Revisionist History is a podcast from Malcolm Gladwell and Pushkin Industries.In this episode: A landmark Supreme Court case. A civil rights revolution. Why has everyone forgotten what happened next?

11.title: Jungalow
11.subtitle: Black-owned home decor store selling furniture, bed and bath products, planters, and more.

products.name: Tigress Tangerine Rug by Justina Blakeney® X Loloi
products.description: Hooked of 100% wool pile, the Tigress Collection brings the wild to the home. Designed by Justina Blakeney by Loloi, the collection brings saturated colors and illustrative designs for a true conversation piece in any space.

products.name: Mary Jane Hook Pillow by Justina Blakeney
products.description: We love the bold contrasting colors of the teal leaf motif against the fresh peachy-orange. The square shape is easy to toss anywhere – a 'chill out chair', a cozy pillow pit on the floor... anywhere you imagine. Hint: This pillows makes for a rad gift for your mellow homies!

products.name: Peace Vase by Justina Blakeney®
products.description: Bold and colorful vessels with personality are kind of our thing here at Jungalow. These Peace Vases will add just the right amount of charm to your #shelfie. Fill with dried foraged flowers or fronds and display it as a sculptural focal point on your entryway table or mantle.

11.title: Implicit Bias -- how it effects us and how we push through
11.subtitle: Everyone makes assumptions about people they don’t know. Melanie Funchess will teach us to recognize these assumptions and work toward a common understanding.

11.title: MLK: The Other America
11.subtitle: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.’s 1967 speech at Stanford. Here, he expounds on his nonviolent philosophy and methodology.

12.title: Iltopia Studios
12.subtitle: Iltopia Studios is a small creative studio based in Portland, Oregon. Our objective is simple: make comics and cartoons that open doors to more understanding. Iltopia Studios is dedicated to producing engaging content to our customers at a high quality and a variety of price points. Founded by creator Steven Christian. His goal is to create quirky adventure stories about the Black experience in America that entertains, empowers, and educates. We make cartoons and comics with emerging technology to provide unique and immersive storytelling experiences.

products.name: Cutie Catcher Pack #1
products.description: This Sticker Pack is collections handcrafted stickers by artist Steven Christian. The designs are based on cartoon and comic Eyelnd Feevr.  All sticker are 4” tall, hand cut, and hand laminated. They are great for placing on laptops, skateboards, water bottles, etc. With all the available designs, there is no limit to where you can place them!

products.name: Black Superheroes Matter Artbook
products.description: Black Superheroes Matter Artbook is the original illustration series by Steven Christian aimed at redefining popular superheroes through the eyes of black children. The book includes 110 full color illustrations ranging from anime to Power Rangers. This quirky collection of illustrations is guaranteed to empower and inspire you to redefine you own heroes in your image. Each book is handmade, numbered, and signed by artist Steven Christian.

products.name: Eyelnd Feevr Season 1: Big City, Small Dreemz
products.description: Big City, Small Dreemz is the first Season in the Eyelnd Feevr Webseries. It introduces us to Roscoe Thomason an intelligent, precocious and rebellious 9-year-old. He explores one of his wildest dreams with his best friend Thomas "T.J." Jenkins. As they try to find the true meaning, one must wonder if this is figment of Roscoe's wild imagination or a foreshadowing of what is to come.

12.title: Microaggressions Matter
12.subtitle: They may not always be ill-intentioned, but the slights illuminate deeper problems in America.

12.title: Ban or Restrict Tear Gas
12.subtitle: The use of tear gas has been banned and is illegal in war. This same tear gas is used by the law enforcement, to control unarmed crowds protesting for the BLM movement. Tear gas is also used for border control and is thrown at innocent migrants who are unarmed and pose no sudden threat to anyone in the vicinity.

13.title: Change.org: Justice for Daunte Wright
13.subtitle: 20 year old man Daunte Wright, a father to a two year old, was murdered by Minneapolis-area police. Help get him and his family justice by signing this petition.

13.title: Daunte's Funeral and future care of Daunte Jr.
13.subtitle: Please donate to give Daunte Wright the proper burial he deserves and to help his son and son's mother Chyna. And if you can't support financially, please send lots of prayers for the family to get through this tragic loss.

13.title: Daunte Wright was stopped for expired plates, but driving while Black may have been his 'crime'
13.subtitle: The police confrontation escalated after officers saw what could have been an air freshener hanging illegally from the rearview mirror.

14.title: Daunte's Funeral and future care of Daunte Jr.
14.subtitle: Please donate to give Daunte Wright the proper burial he deserves and to help his son and son's mother Chyna. And if you can't support financially, please send lots of prayers for the family to get through this tragic loss.

14.title: Enough is Enough! Fire the Cops Who Killed Daunte Wright
14.subtitle: Here’s what we know: Police officers in Brooklyn Center, a Minneapolis suburb, shot and killed Daunte Wright during a traffic stop on Sunday, April 11. An unnamed police officer shot a gun into Daunte’s car, and his car then hit another vehicle. A passenger in Daunte’s care was injured, and Daunte was pronounced dead at the scene.

14.title: How easy (or hard) is it to confuse a gun for a Taser?
14.subtitle: Oscar Grant. Eric Harris. Daunte Wright. April 11, 2020 added another name to the list of Black men killed by police officers who intended to deploy a Taser but instead fired a handgun.

15.title: Brimz Official
15.subtitle: The Brimz culture is a lifestyle choice, we are a community founded on a love for music, fashion and art. We celebrate diverse expression in our great city and a commitment to contributing to our community by supporting the arts. Wherever artistic expression exists, culture and progress are always by its side.

products.name: AJ1 Sneaker Hoodie
products.description: AJ1 inspired limited run

products.name: Classic 6 Cap
products.description: The love for Toronto a.k.a the 6 is real, and we're always repping for the home team. The 6ix cap represents Torontos unique culture and its impact on the world around it. It's alot of love when you're wearing this dad hat, full of the gritty city pride we've grown to love and embrace.

products.name: Blessed Beanie
products.description: Stay blessed all winter long! If winter is your thing then you're truly blessed to not be bothered by the cold, but if that day does come and you need protection the blessed beanie will hold you down.

15.title: The Bail Project
15.subtitle: The Bail Project™ National Revolving Bail Fund is on a mission to combat mass incarceration and reshape the pretrial system in the United States. 100% of online donations are used to bring people home. Since bail money comes back to us when cases close, we're able to recycle every dollar donated at least twice per year.

16.title: NinetyNine Products
16.subtitle: Our mission is to deliver functional & beautiful product that celebrate the people who help people. 99% of our marketing dollars will spotlight those individuals we believe do more than their fare share of shaping our communities in positive ways.

16.title: How the Dodgers 'Took' Jackie Robinson | Field of Dreams...Deferred Part 3
16.subtitle: Brooklyn Dodgers executive Branch Rickey signed Jackie Robinson from the Kansas City Monarchs in 1945, but he refused to pay Negro League teams for their players. Watch more on the fight to integrate MLB in "Field of Dreams...Deferred" Part 3.

17.title: Seventh & Oak
17.subtitle: With self care as our inspiration and sustainability at the hearth of all our products, we craft every candle by hand and with a truckload of love from our home to yours in the hopes that they bring a little more warmth and coziness to your space.

products.name: Zen candle
products.description: When you light the Zen candle, think about how you feel when your space is consumed with good energy and positive thoughts. Burn the Zen candle when you want to cleanse your space to rid it of any negative energy and bring in all the good vibes.

products.name: Namaste candle
products.description: Relaxing lavender beautifully balanced with sweet ylang ylang and grassy vetiver in a recyclable glass jar. Enjoy some time in bed with a good book (or a Netflix show - who's judging?) before heading to bed for your beauty sleep. Just remember to blow it out before drifting off to dreamland.

products.name: Serenity candle
products.description: Fruity but not overpowering; very bright and fresh as each note distinguishes itself. Light up Serenity when you want to freshen up your entryways, kitchens and bathrooms.

17.title: Intersectionality Matters! Podcast
17.subtitle: Intersectionality Matters! is a podcast hosted by Kimberlé Crenshaw, an American civil rights advocate and a leading scholar of critical race theory.

18.title: Martin Luther King Jr.’s ‘Letter From Birmingham Jail’
18.subtitle: In April 1963, King was jailed in Birmingham, Alabama. While there, he wrote a lengthy letter in the margins of a newspaper, and smuggled it out with the help of his lawyer. The eloquent call for “constructive, nonviolent tension” to force an end to unjust laws became a landmark document of the civil-rights movement.

19.title: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.
19.subtitle: We carry grooming products that are primarily geared towards the bearded community, but we also have women and children using them as well. Our oil, balm, and butter are excellent for the hair on your head, and the butter can also double as a lotion.

products.name: Tanzanian Sun Premium Beard Butter
products.description: Black Beard Brigade's beard butter is designed to feel more natural and less oily than others on the market. It is made from 100% natural ingredients that promote a fuller & thicker beard. Soothes and replenishes dry, damaged hair with natural lipid-rich botanicals. Adds the finishing touches for beard renewal and restoration.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

products.name: Premium Classic Beard Oil
products.description: Black Beard Brigade's beard oil is designed to tone, nourish, and clear the skin underneath the beard. It feels more natural and less oily than others on the market. It is made from 100% natural ingredients that promote a fuller & thicker beard.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

products.name: GL Long Sleeve Shirts
products.description: This well-loved favorite features a classic crew neck, long sleeves, and superior combed and ring-spun jersey cotton. Solid colors are made from 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 32 single 4.2 oz, while Athletic Heather is made from 90% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton and 10% poly blend.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

19.title: Constance Baker Motley: Judiciary’s Unsung Rights Hero
19.subtitle: Constance Baker Motley was an unlikely civil rights hero. An African American who grew up near Yale University, she did not personally experience overt racism until late in high school, and as a young person she was almost totally unaware of black history.

20.title: Derek Chauvin sentencing
20.subtitle: A Hennepin County jury found Derek Chauvin guilty on all three counts against him on Tuesday, April 20, 2021, setting the stage for the sentencing of the former Minneapolis officer. Here's what we know about when sentencing will happen and what to expect.

20.title: The Green Laundress
20.subtitle: The Green Laundress offers the best laundry products at the lowest prices online.

products.name: Tub Scrub
products.description: Our Tub Scrub will have your tub as well as your whole bathroom sparkling and smelling fresh and clean! 1-2 heaping spoonfuls with a little water is all you need!

products.name: Laundry Soap
products.description: Our 24 ounce bag of Laundry Soap will have your clothes smelling fresh without any lingering artificial fragrances like commercial detergent. Great for those with sensitive skin!

products.name: Multi-Purpose Spray
products.description: There's no mystery in the name! Our 16 ounce Multi Purpose Spray can be used to clean just about anything.

20.title: Did you really just say that?
20.subtitle: Here's advice on how to confront microaggressions, whether you're a target, bystander or perpetrator

21.title: Stay Informed: Ma'Khia Bryant Shooting
21.subtitle: A teenage girl who the police say threatened two girls with a knife was fatally shot by an officer in Columbus, Ohio, on Tuesday, April 20th, 2021, shortly before a jury reached a guilty verdict in the murder trial of the former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin in last year’s killing of George Floyd.

21.title: Derek Chauvin sentencing
21.subtitle: A Hennepin County jury found Derek Chauvin guilty on all three counts against him on Tuesday, April 20, 2021, setting the stage for the sentencing of the former Minneapolis officer. Here's what we know about when sentencing will happen and what to expect.

21.title: Ashay by the Bay
21.subtitle: We are an Independent Minority Owned Business and Deborah Day is the Founder and CEO. She opened the business in 2000 and started selling books online in 2002, establishing Ashay by the Bay as a Book Reseller that Specializes in African American and Multi-Cultural Children’s Books, Baby-3 and K-12 for Schools and Organizations.  We sell a Diverse Selection of books to both the Consumer and Business Markets and we Build Custom Collections for School and Classroom Libraries.  We also sell Gift Cards provide and we are the publishers of the Mindful Messages Curriculum.  Our home office is located in Vallejo, California. and we sell books throughout the US, Canada and select Markets around the world.

22.title: Racially Targeted Arrests in the Era of Marijuana Reform
22.subtitle: For decades, marijuana laws have been used to criminalize Black and Brown people, waste taxpayer money, and fuel the mass incarceration crisis. However, states across the country are taking strides toward reforming these outdated and harmful policies.

22.title: Tell Congress to Support the MORE Act (H.R. 3884/S. 2227)
22.subtitle: We believe in cannabis legalization, but only if it’s got justice baked right in. Even with more and more states saying yes to legal cannabis, hundreds of thousands of people are still being arrested every year, most of them for possession—and they are disproportionately Black. It doesn’t have to be that way. With your help we can legalize cannabis while expunging prior cannabis convictions, and make 4/20 a day we all can celebrate.

23.title: MoreFire! Hot Sauce
23.subtitle: MoreFire! Hot Sauce is a concoction of spicy fiery goodness. For those who are serious about good quality food. We are 1st place nationwide award winning... so get on the winning Team. You need MoreFire! in your life!

products.name: MoreFire! Hot Sauce (Original)

products.name: MoreFire! Pepper Sauce (Louisiana Style)
products.description: 5 oz bottle of the 1st place Award Winning MoreFire! Pepper Sauce… Ay Yo! I GOT THAT FIRE!

23.title: Remembering South African leader Nelson Mandela
23.subtitle: Nelson Mandela, the first black president of South Africa credited with ending apartheid there, died in Johannesburg on Dec. 5, 2013. Former PBS NewsHour correspondent Charlayne Hunter-Gault takes a look back at Mandela's life and legacy.

24.title: Diarrablu
24.subtitle: The Diarrablu mission is to iterate for sustainability while highlighting the African continent’s rich colors and unique patterns through practical and versatile pieces designed using mathematical concepts or algorithms.

products.name: Sustainable Mailys Dress - Noir
products.description: Sustainable, artisanal and size inclusive, the Mailys Dress is easily convertible into over 19 different styles. This garment is a comfortable and versatile dress thoughtfully designed to fit all body shapes and sizes.

products.name: Headwrap - Suto
products.description: These statement pieces are part of our zero-waste sustainable approach as we believe in maximizing the usage of all our fabrics.

products.name: Hidden in Ocho Rios | Art Print
products.description: In this piece, we daydream of an impromptu retreat in Ocho Rios, Jamaica in a hidden tree-house covered in palm leaves.

24.title: Justice for Lakeith Smith
24.subtitle: Lakeith Smith, now 20, was charged with the murder of his friend, A’Donte Washington when he was only 15— a crime he did not commit. A'donte died at the hands of a policeman, after the police fired 4 rounds into him - and he currently walks free.

25.title: Lyfestyle Clothing
25.subtitle: It’s our goal to produce quality clothing that embodies our inspirations of the moment. We only source premium fabrics, usually directly from NYC's garment district. All of our cut and sewn garments are made at our Brooklyn factory. We strive to build a strong brand by consistently making quality clothing that our customers can be proud to wear.

products.name: Taffy Multicolor Lyfestyle Sweatsuit

products.name: Black Mock Neck Multicolor Dress

products.name: Serpent Lyfestyle Hoody
products.description: 8oz Mid-Weight Fleece. Velvet Print. True to Size. Printed in Brooklyn

25.title: How colorism shapes our standards of beauty
25.subtitle: When Chika Okoro read the casting call for one of her favorite films, she noticed that actresses with darker skin were assigned lesser roles —prompting her to address a phenomenon she'd experienced all her life: colorism. In this eye-opening talk, Okoro shares coping strategies along with steps that could help eliminate this insidious and destructive mindset of discrimination.

26.title: CarmaBella Skincare
26.subtitle: CarmaBella Skincare is made for women who want the best skincare, without any artificial chemicals or unnecessary ingredients. When using our products, you don't have to choose between natural and luxurious.

products.name: Brightening Turmeric Clay Mask
products.description: Want an instant glow? We have the perfect natural skincare product to help you achieve it. The Brightening Turmeric Clay Mask instantly brightens dull, tired skin and restores your skins healthy complexion over time.

products.name: HydroSurge Moisturizing Gel
products.description: The HydroSurge Moisturizing Gel replenishes water and helps to improve your skin's moisture barrier, resulting in smooth, hydrated skin. This addictively refreshing gel leaves skin plump, dewy, and glowing.

products.name: The Essential Bath & Body Set
products.description: The Essential Bath & Body Set is a nourishing collection that will leave your skin feeling soft and moisturized all day. This set includes the Natural Sugar Based Body Wash, a bath puff, and the Nourishing Shea Body Lotion.

26.title: How studying privilege systems can strengthen compassion
26.subtitle: Her TED Talk offers a shift in the traditional view of race, equity and privilege. McIntosh uses her own experience as a white woman to inform her own knowledge of racial experiences from a white perspective.

27.title: Riot Swim
27.subtitle: Riot Swim is an online designer swimwear and beachwear brand, offering an exclusive collection of bikinis, one piece swimsuits, and more.

products.name: Echo One Piece- Kiwi
products.description: Minimal coverage front and back. Doubles as bodysuit. Body sculpting. Fitted at waist to flatter curves.

products.name: Pico Top-Chocolate
products.description: Full coverage top. Adjustable tie. Body sculpting. No Padding.

products.name: Riot Crop Tee-Black
products.description: Short-sleeve crop. Cotton tee. Round neck.

27.title: Why Protests and Riots Work
27.subtitle: Riots are destructive, dangerous, and scary — but can lead to serious social reforms. To prevent more violent uprisings and protests, we need to take their causes seriously.

28.title: Mystic Momma
28.subtitle: Specializing in teas, tinctures, yoni steams, sitz baths, blends for hormone balance, reproductive health and womb wellness.

products.name: Vital-A-Tea
products.description: In TCM, the heart is said to house the Shen. Shen is best described as the spirit/soul, but also encompasses the  mind. So what better way to revitalize Shen then to experience this high vitamin and mineral tea full of heart healthy herbs!

products.name: Ultimate Gold body butter
products.description: This hydrating aloe and shea body butter is an indulgent treat for the body.  Layer over skin after a warm shower. May refrigerate this body butter for a cooling effect and longer shelf life.

products.name: Cleansing Herbs
products.description: The Mystic Momma Cleansing Herbs includes a strong dose of herbs to help clean out the uterus and improve blood circulation to the mid-section. The herbs included promote circulation, balance the vaginal flora, improve scent, tighten skin, clear out excess mucus and nourish the reproductive organs.

28.title: Seeing White Podcast Series
28.subtitle: Just what is going on with white people? Police shootings of unarmed African Americans. Acts of domestic terrorism by white supremacists. The renewed embrace of raw, undisguised white-identity politics. Unending racial inequity in schools, housing, criminal justice, and hiring. Some of this feels new, but in truth it’s an old story.

29.title: Kultured Misfits
29.subtitle: Kultured Misfits is a lifestyle, sport and ready-to-wear brand based out of Atlanta, Georgia. With a heavy influence from culture found in music, film, and art, we are driven to create timeless work by portraying an aesthetic that is uniquely our own to impact our everyday life.

products.name: Kultured Misfits Tracksuit (Crew + Joggers)
products.description: Classic Kultured Misfits tracksuIt set with matching crewneck and jogger pants in black. A comfortable cotton mix jogger, featuring embroidered Kultured Misfits logo on the left chest and thigh. Drawstring waist and cuffed hems.

products.name: Legalize Free College (Do Tha Right Thang) T-Shirt
products.description: Every sale of a Legalize Free College product will contribute to the "Legalize Free College Scholarship"!

products.name: MISFIT Embossed Crewneck
products.description: Premium crewneck is cut from French terry jersey. With the embossed cursive logo adds a signature finishing touch to its classic design.

29.title: Koils by Nature
29.subtitle: It's the mission of Koils by Nature to provide beauty products, with highest quality plant-based ingredients, excellent customer service, and an educating, empowering, engaging our online community.

products.name: Ultimate Beard Kit
products.description: The Koils by Nature Beard Kit is an all-natural and certified vegan line of skin and hair care products developed exclusively for men. Gentle enough to use every day, and infused with soft, fresh scents, the kit includes the dual-action beard and face cleanser and shaving foam, a moisturizer, beard butter, and oil. When used regularly, each item works together to give your skin the moisture and healing it needs, so your beard can thrive - and look good as it grows. If you’ve experienced a dry, patchy beard, or are ready to finally see those pesky razor bump scars go away, we’ve got you!

products.name: Nourishing Hair and Body Butter Marvelous Mango
products.description: Nourishing Hair & Body Butter is made from the best butters & oils nature provides, it will moisturize, revitalize, heal, and protect your hair and skin. The lightly scented fresh mango scent will have you thinking of a tropical island! This butter smells delightful, please do not ingest, for external use only.

products.name: Sage & Lemongrass Collection
products.description: Moisturized hair is healthy hair. When your natural hair is dry, it's frustrating and feels like a problem you'll never solve. Our Sage & Lemongrass Collection offers the hydration your dehydrated curls need.

30.title: Kids Swag
30.subtitle: Great action is taking place to improve diversity in books and dolls and there are a number of different vendors making it easier to find these great items. But what about everything else in your child's world? You go grocery shopping, what image is on the cute plate and cup set your child wants? You're want to encourage their creativity, what images are in their colouring books? You're throwing a birthday party, what are your options?
30.moreInfo: The list can go on and on. It is an unnecessarily complicated task to source and purchase everyday lifestyle products for children that have black images. These companies exist but one must be internet savvy and social media literate to find them. KIDS SWAG was launched in December 2016 to make it easy for parents to build environments that are reflective of their child's beauty.

products.name: Nia Ballerina Backpack
products.description: This beautifully illustrated pink rucksack is the perfect accessory for your little ballerina, which is both lightweight and practical with plenty of storage. Made from durable and water-resistant material this rucksack features a colourful design with two images of Nia Ballerina on the front.

products.name: Nana Yaa
products.description: Nana means Queen or King in West Africa , Ghana. The founders of Nana Dolls wanted to teach the younger generation of their history whilst also having fun. There were many strong courageous women from all over Africa who helped to fight for freedom.

products.name: Super Friends Onesie
products.description: Your little Superhero featured as your favourite Superhero.

30.title: Oh-Mazing!
30.subtitle: Yes, we sell granola (it's quite tasty), but more importantly, we want to inspire you to live your life with purpose, passion, and to follow your dreams. Our products are here to bring the adventure back to snacking, and better yet, celebrate YOU when those dreams are achieved.

products.name: Original Recipe
products.description: The Original Recipe blend has a sweet caramel flavor that makes it simply delicious. There are so many ways to enjoy this treat--topping on your yogurt, adding some crunch to your favorite ice cream, or creating a crust for a cheesecake.

products.name: Lemon Bar
products.description: Lemon Bar will please the palate of all lemon lovers and add a refreshing flavor to a bowl of oatmeal or a new bite to your favorite cheesecake recipe.

products.name: Caribbean Delight
products.description: Caribbean Delight is our first vegan product. The ingredients include coconut oil, grated coconut, and a touch of raisins that will make your palate dance. Not to mention, you will immediately be reminded of that time you went on an island vacation.
